patterns: Do you support students with disabilities?
responses: Yes, we are committed to providing an inclusive environment. Please contact student affairs for assistance and arrangements.
Accessibility support is available on request, and we encourage students to communicate their needs early.

patterns: Do you have parent orientation sessions?
Is there a briefing for parents?
responses: Yes, parent and guardian orientation sessions are conducted at the beginning of each academic intake.
Details are sent via email or available from the admissions office prior to the start date.

patterns: What's the difference between a diploma and a certificate?
Should I take a certificate or diploma course?
Which one is better, diploma or certificate?
responses: Diplomas are typically longer and more in-depth than certificates. They often include practical components and may lead to further study.
Certificates are usually short-term and skill-focused. A counselor can help you choose based on your goals.

patterns: When will exam results be released?
How do I check my results?
responses: Results are typically released within 4 to 6 weeks after the exam. Check your student portal or contact your department for updates.
Notifications will be sent by email or posted on the LMS when results are ready.

patterns: Does this course have international recognition?
responses: Yes, our programs are accredited by local and international bodies. For specifics, please refer to the program details.
Many of our qualifications are recognized globally, especially those awarded by partner universities.

patterns: What if I miss an exam?
I was sick on exam day, what should I do?
responses: If you miss an exam due to valid reasons like illness, you must submit a formal excuse with supporting documents.
You may be eligible for a deferred exam. Contact the exam department as soon as possible.

patterns: Can I access the lab after hours?
responses: Yes, ESOFT provides fully equipped labs for IT, engineering, and science programs.
Lab access policies vary by campus. Check with your coordinator for schedules.

patterns: How do I log in to the LMS?
I can't access my student portal
responses: You can access the LMS through our website using your student credentials. If you're having trouble, contact IT support.
Login details are sent via email upon enrollment. Check your spam folder or visit the helpdesk for assistance.

patterns: What are the final year project requirements?
Can you explain the research project format?
responses: Final year project guidelines vary by program. You’ll receive a handbook and be assigned a supervisor to guide you.
Deadlines and formats are communicated through the LMS or department emails.

patterns: How do I get my student ID card?
When will I receive my ID?
responses: Student ID cards are issued within the first two weeks of enrollment. Collect yours from the student services desk.
If you've lost your ID, report it immediately. A replacement fee may apply.

patterns: Can I take a weekend class?
What are your short course options?
responses: Yes, we offer short-term and weekend programs in IT, business, English, and more. Check the Short Courses section on our site.
You can enroll in flexible short courses that fit your schedule. Contact admissions for the upcoming schedule.

patterns: How do I check my scholarship status?
Who do I ask about my scholarship?
responses: You can check your scholarship application status via the student portal or contact the scholarships desk directly.
If you've been selected, you'll be notified via email and your portal will reflect the award.
